Package r7.sabre.spaces

Class StoryAction

java.lang.Object
r7.sabre.spaces.StoryAction
public class StoryAction extends Object
A story action represents an action in the context of a specific story, and includes information obtained from the solution such as which goals explained the action and which actions enabled it.
Author:
Rachelyn Farrell

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a story action for the first step of the given solution.

    • isExplainedBy

      public boolean isExplainedBy(CharacterGoal goal)
      Returns true if the given goal appears in the explanations for this action.
      Parameters:
      goal - the goal
      Returns:
      true if this action was explained by this goal

    • hasCausalAncestor

      public boolean hasCausalAncestor(Action action)
      Returns true if the given action is a causal ancestor of this action, or is the action itself.
      Parameters:
      action - an action to test
      Returns:
      true if the given action is the same as this action or one of its causal ancestors

    • involvesEntity

      public boolean involvesEntity(Entity entity)
      Returns true if the given entity appears in the parameters of this action.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity
      Returns:
      true if the entity is one of this action's parameters
